  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calculateRoundCredit(int handScore, int roundCredit)
    calculateRoundCredit takes the score of the hand and the bet and calculates the return.
    int
    calculateScore()
    calculateScore checks the players hand and gives a score based on what it has. higher value hands are checked first.
    int
    countRankFrequencies(char s)
    countRankFrequencies checks how many cards are the rank s, given as entry parameter.
    int
    countSuitFrequencies(char s)
    countSuitFrequencies checks how many cards are the suit s, given as entry parameter.
    boolean
    isFlush()
    isFlush checks if the player's hand is a flush. this is done by checking if there are 5 cards with the same suit.
    boolean
    isPair()
    isPair checks if the player's hand is a pair. does this by going through the cards and checking if there are 2 of the same rank.
    boolean
    isStraight()
    isStraight checks if the player's hand is a straight. does this by going through the hand and checking if every card is next in order to the one before it. if this happens, there is a straight.
    boolean
    isThreeOfKind()
    isThreeOfKind checks if the player's hand is a three of a kind. does this by going through the cards and checking if there are 3 of the same rank.
    boolean
    isTwoPairs()
    isTwoPairss checks if the player's hand has two pair. if it does, the second and fourth positions always have a card that is part of it, so it is only necessary to check if there is another card of the same rank found in these positions.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
